ygData.subject: Kos in your guild by killing undead if you are a gnome
ygData.msgSnippet: ... decaying ... Trust me dont kill Dwarf Skeletons in the new be aria. You get a faction hit that has your guild name right on it. Also the Gnome skeletons
ygData.messageBody:
>As far as I know, Dwarf skeletons DON'T have a negative faction hit against
>the gnome necro guild. The only things I have found that do are the
decaying
>gnome skeletons and some of the gnome skeletons.


Trust me dont kill Dwarf Skeletons in the new be aria. You get a faction hit
that has your guild name right on it. Also the Gnome skeletons are a no no
as well. You also my find trouble if you start fighting clock work in the
field. You will become kos in parts of your town as well. I KNOW TRUST
ME!!!!!!!!! and as far as I know so far there is now way to fix that faction
fit.
